A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Possibly the worst Star Wars movie yet. I was really excited after quite enjoying The Force Awakens (even if it was close to the plot of A New Hope). The humour wasn’t necessarily bad\, but was poorly placed and contradicted itself (Luke brushing off his shoulder loses it’s appeal once you know he’s not there). There’s so much more to get into but I’m not wasting my time. In the end one of the biggest problems is Rian Johnson. I really hope they take the new trilogy away from him and hopefully J.J. can save this trilogy with IX....
